solution_line_template: Casey can hula hoop {casey_less_than_nancy} minutes less than Nancy so she can hula hoop for {nancy_minutes}-{casey_less_than_nancy} = <<{nancy_minutes}-{casey_less_than_nancy}={casey_minutes}>>{casey_minutes} minutes

Morgan can hula hoop three times as long as Casey, who can hula hoop for {casey_minutes} minutes, so she can hula hoop for {morgan_times_casey}*{casey_minutes} = <<{morgan_times_casey}*{casey_minutes}={morgan_minutes}>>{morgan_minutes} minutes
